Entries.default: "A moment of your time, Watcher. The Bardattos and Valeras may be at each other's throats, but both are vital to the Company's strategy in the Deadfire."
"The Company will tolerate some level of mischief and bloodshed - even murder - between them, but not burning one family to the waterline. I won't tolerate it, either. Is that clear?"
"They are already feuding. Burning one family to the waterline may stand as a warning to the rest."
"I'll do my best to keep the peace."
"They're going to fight each other anyway. We might as well get paid."
"Good. It may come to violence, but use restraint. A little spilled blood may cool passions on both sides, but it has a greater chance of inflaming them."
"And this is my warning to you. I am here because the Canta wants you to help Vailian interests in the Deadfire. If you intend to profit from our destruction, we will put an end to it."
"Ac, they are going to fight, but you can influence how they fight and how this ends. Be responsible."
"Postenago! Was razing the Dyrwood not enough for you? You've just killed a prominent member of a high-seated Vailian family!"
"I'm not going to stay here to see what excuse you have or who will be next to die by your hand. I should have known entering your company was a mistake. Cor√®s, Watcher."
"The Bardattos are not on the Company's board, but they are major investors in Company operations. The Valeras keep pirates from sacking our ships."
"And I will handle you as I choose."
